scripts.build:clean: bun run clean && bun run workspaces @lombokapp/types build:clean && bun --cwd ./packages/utils build:clean && bun run build
scripts.publish:dev: bun run build:clean && YARN_NPM_REGISTRY_SERVER="https://npm.wasteofpaper.com" yarn npm publish --access restricted --tag @lombokapp/app-worker-sdk
